titleStmt.title: The entrance of Mazzarini. Or; Some memorials of the state of France, between the death of the Cardinall of Richelieu and the beginning of the late regency. Collected and digested out of forraign writers. By an indifferent hand.
titleStmt.author: Tanner, Thomas, 1630-1682.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by H.H. Printer to the University. for Thom. Robinson.,

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last three leaves are blank.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
